TopicTitle: I cant download BD armory for ksp 1.2.0

Articles.Content: So I installed BD Armory on my ksp twice and both times it didn`t work... please I need some advice if y'all have any thoughts on how to fix my problem plz contact me

2 hours ago, eletrick101 said:

So I installed BD Armory on my ksp twice and both times it didn`t work... please I need some advice if y'all have any thoughts on how to fix my problem plz contact me

Hi, if you installed it and it did not work then you did not install it correctly. And more importantly there is no official version available for KSP 1.2, the only version available is for 1.2 pre release and is only partly functional.

21 minutes ago, SpannerMonkey(smce) said:

Hi, if you installed it and it did not work then you did not install it correctly. And more importantly there is no official version available for KSP 1.2, the only version available is for 1.2 pre release and is only partly functional.

Oh lol... I went 2 a older version of KSP and it showed me in kerban so Im trying to fix that now
